Identification.LongTitle: Order Prescribing the Fees To Be Paid for Registration under a Program Established Pursuant to the Urea Formaldehyde Insulation Act

Provision.Text: The Minister of Consumer and Corporate Affairs, pursuant to paragraph 13(b) of the Financial Administration Act and Order in Council P.C. 1984-398 of 2 February 1984*, hereby makes the annexed Order prescribing the fees to be paid for registration under a program established pursuant to the Urea Formaldehyde Insulation Act**.

Footnote.Text: SI/84-38, 1984 Canada Gazette Part II, p. 961

SignatureTitle.Emphasis: Minister of Consumer and Corporate Affairs

Section.Text: This Order may be cited as the Program Registration Fees Order.
The fees payable by a person who applies

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: to register in a Field Sampling Program, or

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: for registration in an Analytical Program

ContinuedSectionSubsection.Text: established pursuant to the Urea Formaldehyde Insulation Act shall be as follows:
